chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 Pro has the above problem:

Hello,
The phone's sound is too soft. I can hardly hear the audio files that are sent to me via WhatsApp, although the volume is set to maximum in the settings. I also had a problem when I tried to log in to Facebook. Every time I downloaded the app, I was redirected to a foreign account, which I suspect belongs to the previous owner of the phone. For all these reasons, I would like to exchange my phone for another iPhone 13 Pro, preferably in Sierra Blac. Is there a phone number where we can reach each other?

Thank you,
Maria Carla Olivera

Translated with www.DeepL.com/Translator (free version)

Thank you very much for your help,

Hi ecomobile,

Just a friendly reminder that the customer is waiting for their >>refund<<.
We have listed some issues with their corresponding resolutions here in case these are preventing you from carrying out the refund. Please use the "Report a Problem" button on the bottom of the screen to declare an issue with the customer's return and stop a refund from being made on your behalf.

1. In case of a delivery issue: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-transport-issue-lost-stolen-damaged-parcel

2. In case of a user account (e.g. iCloud, Google) still connected: 
iCloud: 
https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/What-to-do-with-a-device-locked-to-iCloud

Google: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/How-to-manage-a-product-blocked-with-an-account-Android-Google

3. In case of a warranty exclusion: https://backmarketportal.force.com/ssc/s/article/Declare-and-manage-warranty-exclusion

Thanks for your help in keeping our shared customers happy!
Claudia Back Market customer Care

Dear Backcare, 

Thank you. We are still processing the device. Will update you soon once we finish checking the device. Thank you.

Regards, 
KW

Hello ecomobile,

We would like to inform you that, in accordance with our Quality Charter, we have refunded 585,80€ to the customer for not respecting the deadline to make the refund

Kind regards, 
Claudia from Back Market
